about_the_game:
Mechjestic is a Singleplayer, steampunk inspired, Roguelike Deckbuilder Card-Game RPG. Explore procedural generated floors for loot and enemies to defeat. Build the Deck using the cards you collect and Craft your Mech in battle! Our unique Refuel mechanic gives players a lot of freedom to play their cards how they see fit to make every turn count. There is never one way to finish a battle! Be creative and use your favorite strategies!

The player controls Frolein and her personal Mech; Iron Tadpole. The world is being invaded by the TimeKeeper and Dr. Chronos to steal energy from the ancient Timeline. Fight your way through time against the hordes of insectoid harvesting machines and save everyone! During your runs, you can encounter Civilians, Vendors, Treasures and multiple Heroes that will join your cause by giving their own unique Mech parts to improve your Deck.

Unique Features

  • Visual Mech Building : By gathering and building your deck with Equipment cards, you can use these cards to visually change the Mech and gain its attributes for combat. Using all five limbs from one specific set will grant you special bonuses!

  • Refuel Mechanic : Playing cards or upgrading your Engine requires the use of Fuel. With Mechjestic you have the freedom to spend Fuel that you have accumulated or Refuel the cards in your hand to obtain more Fuel to use during your turn. This flexible system allows the player a lot of freedom in how they structure and play their Decks.

  • Dedicated Engines : The player is able to find several Engines to improve the synergy in combat. Each engine will have its own special ability and can be upgraded to increase its potential. Each turn, do you want to draw more cards, more Power, more Defense? Or do you want to have more Fuel each turn? Engines can grant several different bonuses each turn depending on your own strategies.

  • Timeless Mode : In this roguelike mode you will embark on an ever changing adventure with your starter Deck that keeps going Endlessly! The Overworld will change with each floor containing new enemies, new treasures, new allies and new strategies to account for! But be careful, after every 10 levels there will be a Boss blocking you, trying to stop your run!

  • Overworld Mechanics : The player goes through a procedurally generated Overworld to find the end of each floor. This happens in a puzzle style in which the player carefully thinks about where they go. With a 'fog of war' covering the map, it will not be an easy task to find where to go! The player is able to explore, find treasure, solve puzzles and rotate the tiles around your position whenever possible. But be careful! You need to keep track of your Movement and Restart points. Are you out of movement? You will lose a Restart Point and teleport back to the Start position of this floor. Are you out of Restart Points? The run will be over and you will Revert back in Time to the main menu. Gather your courage and start a new run in search of the Timekeeper!

And sometimes... Not everything goes as planned...

But if you're lucky, you will be able to use rare Hero Cards!

short_description: Mechjestic is a Roguelike Deckbuilder RPG where you endlessly explore randomly generated maps to find new cards & build the Deck to craft your Mech in combat. Tired of unlucky draws? Sacrifice cards in your hand with our special Refuel system and use that Fuel to leap into action at crucial moments!
